mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_birth, mem_phone, mem_role, mem_status, mem_email, mem_gender ) VALUES ( #{mem_id}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_birth}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_role}, #{mem_status}, #{mem_email}, #{mem_gender} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE MEMBER
mem_pw = #{mem_pw},
mem_name = #{mem_name},
TO_DATE(#{mem_birth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),
mem_phone = #{mem_phone},
mem_email = #{mem_email},
WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE mem_id = #{memId}
